foods.name: Cheese Pizza
foods.details: A classic Italian dish made with a crispy crust, tangy tomato sauce, and melted cheese. It can be topped with various ingredients to suit different tastes.

foods.name: Chicken Burger
foods.details: A juicy chicken patty sandwiched between soft buns with fresh vegetables and creamy mayonnaise, offering a delicious fast-food experience.

foods.name: Pani Puri
foods.details: A popular Indian street snack consisting of crispy puris filled with spicy, tangy water and a mixture of potatoes and chickpeas.

foods.name: Chicken Biryani
foods.details: A flavorful and aromatic rice dish made with layers of spiced chicken and fragrant rice, garnished with fried onions and fresh coriander.

foods.name: Chocolate Milk Shake
foods.details: A rich and creamy chocolate milkshake blended with cocoa and chocolate syrup, topped with whipped cream for an indulgent treat.

foods.name: Dosa
foods.details: A crispy and thin South Indian pancake made from fermented rice and lentil batter, often served with coconut chutney and sambar.

foods.name: Pav Bhaji
foods.details: A spicy and flavorful mashed vegetable curry served with butter-toasted pav, a famous Mumbai street food.

foods.name: Butter Chicken
foods.details: A creamy and mildly spiced North Indian dish featuring tender chicken pieces cooked in a rich tomato-based butter sauce.

foods.name: Paneer Tikka
foods.details: A delicious appetizer where marinated paneer cubes are grilled to perfection, giving them a smoky and spicy flavor.

foods.name: Dal Makhani
foods.details: A creamy and rich lentil dish slow-cooked with butter and aromatic spices, a staple in Punjabi cuisine.

foods.name: Chole Bhature
foods.details: A combination of spicy chickpea curry served with deep-fried fluffy bread, a popular North Indian delicacy.

foods.name: Samosa
foods.details: A crispy and savory deep-fried pastry filled with a spiced potato mixture, commonly enjoyed as a snack with chutney.

foods.name: Aloo Paratha
foods.details: A stuffed Indian flatbread filled with a spiced potato mixture, served with butter, yogurt, or pickle.

foods.name: Shrimp Scampi
foods.details: A flavorful seafood dish made with shrimp saut√©ed in garlic butter sauce, served over pasta or with bread.

foods.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
foods.details: A quick and healthy stir-fry made with fresh vegetables and flavored with soy sauce and aromatic spices.

foods.name: Bread Omelet
foods.details: A quick and delicious breakfast dish where eggs are whisked with spices and vegetables, then cooked with bread slices for a crispy and flavorful meal.
